section.p: When initially deployed, provides a branding package with a neutral branding (oscm-branding container). several configuration settings that influence the behavior of marketplaces. Marketplace owners can customize the layout and branding of their marketplaces. This includes the colors, fonts, background images, and logos displayed to the marketplace visitors.

Marketplace owners may ask you to change the oscm-branding container such that a customized layout is applied. For this, they need to provide a TAR archive with the structure as available when downloading the default branding package using the Customize layout menu option in the Marketplace menu of the administration portal.
To apply changes to the marketplace layout, you need to proceed as follows:

ol.li: Log in to the Docker host as user root.

Change the format of the archive file provided by a marketplace owner to .tar.gz using the gzip tool. For every marketplace owner organization, create a separate directory in
<Docker_host>/docker/config/oscm-branding/brandings
Copy the *.tar.gz file you created to the respective directory of the marketplace owner organization.

To load the customized layout:
Stop the oscm-branding container:
docker stop oscm-branding
Remove the oscm-branding container:
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml rm oscm-branding
Recreate and restart the oscm-branding container:
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d oscm-branding
